TopicTitle: I'm looking for help with the wings

Articles.Content: I am a new player and I liked the game a lot so far. I am having a problem though with the wings. When I try to attach them at some points they at like it's on a rounded surface and I am trying to connect them to each other. What I am trying to say is I can't seem to make what I am looking for because the wings wont respond to the way they should be responding. I know that's something that would have to be looked at and dealt with over a good time. I would like to make a epic space ship but I can't yet please help me out.

It's generally a mistake to think something that doesn't "respond to the way they should be responding" is not working the way it should work. Rather better to become familiar with how it does work and then then respond to how it reponds.

Start a little less epic. Make small things that work, get used to what works and how, then improve in the direction that most suits you - smaller, more efficient, longer-range, higher-capacity, cheaper or whatever. You particularly don't want to be messing about with wings while learning.
I think you may have a problem with angle snap. Press c to toggle it on and off and see if it makes a difference.
